paper_abstract: Mutual exclusion is a fundamental process synchronization problem in concurrent systems. In this paper, we propose a unified framework for mutual exclusion, k-mutual exclusion, mutual inclusion, l-mutual inclusion and such, what we call critical section problem. Then, we show that critical section problem is characterized by a pair of integers. (c) 2014 The Author. Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: On the family of critical section problems
